author: Dj Walter Scott
text:
A 10-member gang hacked to death an AIADMK councillor and his 21-year-old son after barging into their house at Nattarasankottai near here on Sunday.

Police said Nagarajan (50), councillor of the Nattarasankottai town panchayat, his son Vignesh (21), daughter Danapriya and wife Usha (45) were at home when the gang members, armed with deadly weapons, barged in.

Nagarajan and his son died on the spot and Usha, who came to their rescue, suffered cut injuries in her hands. After being given first aid at the local government hospital, she was admitted to a hospital in Madurai.

Intra-party rivalry is believed to be the cause for the double murder.

Mr. Nagarajan, who was the former AIADMK secretary of Nattarasankottai town panchayat, had enmity with the incumbent, Ravi, as the deceased continued to command power in the party.

When Mr. Ravi recently ‘appointed’ Kanmani, an anti-social element as the town panchayat youth wing leader, Mr. Vignesh opposed the appointment and lodged a compliant with the party high command and this is believed to be the immediate provocation, police said.

The gang members came on two-wheelers and after hacking to death the father and son, escaped on the same vehicles.
title: AIADMK councillor, son murdered
